column1: Little Goat Diner////Little Goat is a classy
column2: upscale-ish diner and bakery. The food is really lovely. For the bakery
column5: etcs.) and a rotating menu of other goodies. Standouts of the seasonal offerings were the Apricot Masala scones and squash muffins. On the dessert menu
column6: the apple and fennel pie was a wonderful variation on the American classic.
